item.title: Trailers of 10 interesting movies.
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: 10 films the US Government would rather you not see. The only one of these ("V"), but I'm a bit of a documentary nut so I'd love to see them all. I'm going to pick up "An Inconvenient Truth" first time I get a chance to.
item.excerpt:encoded: 10 films the US Government would rather you not see. The only one of these ("V"), but I'm a bit of a documentary nut so I'd love to see them all. I'm going to pick up "An Inconvenient Truth" first time I get a chance to.
